document_data.mainbody:
antam was the guild master of Xantams Thieves Guild, an emergent criminal organization in Baldurs Gate, with the secret backing of Eldrith.
His primary agent was Karne, in truth a Zhentarim agent.
His guild was destroyed and Xantam was killed by the heroes Vahn, Adrianna, and Kromlech Bruenghor.
